nodes.text: The Hoth Snow Machine was a device that could be used to create snowballs. It could also be used as a house decoration to make an illusion of snow falling in a room that it is placed in.

The Hoth Snow Machine can produce 25 snowballs which can last up to 5 minutes, depending on if the region you are in is generally cold or warm. In a warm area, the snowballs will melt, meaning that you have less time to use them before they are completely gone. Using the snow machine in a cold area will make your snowballs last longer.

You can also place the machine in your house as a decoration. If you turn the machine on, it will make the illusion that snow is falling inside a room. You can adjust the settings to make the snow fall heavily, medium, or lightly.
